author: GOTD_Editor
title: Song Surgeon Trainer (Win & Mac) 1.0
text:

Every day we offer FREE licensed software you’d have to buy otherwise. $29.95 Giveaway of the day — Song Surgeon Trainer (Win & Mac) 1.0 Song Surgeon Trainer is an entry level desktop audio slow downer. User rating: 2 (100%) 0 (0%) Leave a comment 
Song Surgeon Trainer (Win & Mac) 1.0 is available as a Giveaway of the day! You have limited time to download and install it. Download Now Song Surgeon Trainer (Win & Mac) 1.0 Terms and conditions 
Song Surgeon Trainer is an entry level desktop audio slow downer. It changes key and tempo, allows the creation of one looping area for repetitive playing, and has a 9 band EQ. All of these features can be applied in real time. Song Surgeon Trainer allows musicians to access to the power of slowing down and looping audio as a learning tool. Results from our survey of musicians showed that slowing down a song or music piece as a means of practice increased their learning ability by an average of 614%. 
MAC users can download the package here (for Mac OSx 10.6.8 – 10.12 versions)   
The program is available for $29.95,but it will be free for our visitorsas a time-limited offer. Song Surgeon Standard or Pro Version 5 
The newest release of Song Surgeon, Version 5, will be release soon. In addition to distortion free audio after key and tempo change, this new version will have Chord Detection, key detection and automatic beat detection built into it – in addition to dozens of other features including audio editing, audio recording, 31 band EQ, 4-beat click track creation, metronome, vocal reduction and much, much more. Sign up here and we’ll notify you as soon as these new version is available. If you download and register Song Surgeon Trainer in the above free giveaway, there is no need to sign up. Video Surgeon 
Video Surgeon is a video analysis tool that enables users to perform video slow motion, zooming, loop creation for repetitive playback and even frame by frame analysis. These functions allow you to break down and analyze any video so you can see exactly how something is being done. Anyone that uses video in their teaching, training, instruction or lessons will find Video Surgeon to be an immensely valuable learning tool. Download Surgeon 
Download Surgeon is a A/V application that allows you to grab any audio or any video from any website. No exceptions. There are lots of downloaders out there but they all suffer from one big problem. That don’t work on every site. Download Surgeon solves that problem by combining direct download modules with a digital recorder. This combination allows users to grab anything, whether audio or video, and save it to their machine. That means you can use the entire WWW as your personal A/V library.
